LanguageData.VCHE_ExtractChemfuelDesc: Extract 150 chemfuel from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VCHE_ExtractDeepchemDesc: Extract 150 deepchem from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VCHE_CantPlaceHere: Deepchem pumpjack can only be placed on the deepchem deposit. Use ground-penetrating scanner to find the deposits.
LanguageData.VCHE_ChemValveDesc: Switches chemfuel flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VCHE_DeepChemValveDesc: Switches deepchem flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
